name: FreeSMSIndia
overview:
FreeSMSIndia ( http://www.freesmsindia.org ) is India’s premier website for provinding Free SMS to India , offers unlimited Free SMS to cell phones in India for all registered users. You can send long 270 character

SMS. With our web SMS you can Send SMS from internet from your computer or pc to mobile. Our Free Text services are regarded as one of the best free message delivery system across the globe. It is easy to

register, Just provide your mobile number, name, age etc on http://www.freesmsindia.org/register.php and click on submit.
